summary.para: The SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES_HASH structure specifies a hash values for the specified array of security identifiers (SIDs).
The number of SIDs pointed to by the SidAttr parameter.
A pointer to an array of structures that represent SIDs and their attributes.
An array of pointers to hash values. These values correspond to the structures pointed to by the SidAttr parameter.
The SID_HASH_ENTRY data type is defined in Winnt.h as a ULONG_PTR.
The SID_HASH_SIZE array dimension is defined in Winnt.h as 32.
